Peace Regis Mutuuzo bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda nke na-eje ozi dị ka onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị maka Bunyangabu District Ọ bụ Minista nke Steeti maka Mmekọahụ na Ọdịbendị na Kọmitii Ugandan
A họpụtara ya n'ọkwa ahụ na 6 June 2016.
A mụrụ ya na 2 Mee 1975, na mpaghara Rwimi, Bunyangabu, na Kabarole District, na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ nke Uganda
Kemgbe ahụ, a gbanwere obodo Bunyangabu ka ọ bụrụ mpaghara Bunyangabo.  Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na St
Peter and Paul Primary School, Katikamu SDA Secondary School na Mpanga Secondary School dị na Fort Portal
Ọ bụ onye isi nwanyị mgbe ọ nọ na Mpanga.
Ọ gara National Teachers College Kakoba (NTCK), nke bụzi akụkụ nke Mahadum Bishop Stuart na Mbarara, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Diploma na Secondary Education
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nke ụmụ akwụkwọ na NTCK, mgbe ọ nọ ebe ahụ.
Ọ sonyeere Mahadum Makerere, mahadum ọha na eze kachasị ochie na Uganda, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Bachelor of Environmental Science
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ nwetara Master of Public Administration and Management site na Uganda Management Institute na Kampala.

Tupu ọ banye na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ Give and Take nke John Sanyu Katuramu (na-eje ozi ndụ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ Luzira) ma mesịa na Ọfịs Onye isi ala, dị ka odeakwụkwọ onwe onye nke Onye isi ala nke Uganda

N'afọ 2016, ọ gbara ọsọ maka ọkwa onye nnọchi anya nwanyị maka mpaghara Kabarole, mana e meriri ya na ntuli aka nke National Resistance Movement. N'abalị isii n'ọnwa Juun afọ 2016, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista na-ahụ maka Mmekọahụ na Ọdịbendị.

Otu n'ime ọrụ mbụ ọ malitere n'ọkwa minista ọhụrụ ya bụ nsogbu ime ihe ike mmekọahụ. Ihe ọzọ dị na atụmatụ ya bụ atụmatụ mmepe, mmụba na imezigharị National Theater, nke e wuru na 1959 ma ugbu a pere mpe iji nweta nnukwu ndị na-ege ntị. Ọ bụ onye otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị National Resistance Movement
